title: Rohit Negi
text: Very poor experience. While opening my account, the app auto-filled incorrect details about my broker dealings and gave no option to edit or go back. This forces users to sign false information on a legal form. Customer support is unhelpful, only sending generic ‚Äúwe tried to contact you‚Äù replies instead of providing solutions. For a financial app handling sensitive investments, this lack of basic functionality and support is unacceptable.
author: Rohit Negi
